data.title: Rygar: The Legendary Adventure (PS2) *MINT COMPLETE*
data.meta_description: Excellent condition & 100% complete with contents: Rygar The Legendary Adventure for SONY PlayStation 2 / PS2. This preowned game is in excellent
data.text:
Description

Excellent condition & 100% complete with contents: Rygar The Legendary Adventure for SONY PlayStation 2 / PS2. This preowned game is in excellent condition, and comes complete with case, cover, manual / booklet, and game disc. A tidy, complete, collector’s item. A couple of very faint scratches on the disc, but these were so fine that I could only see them up close, and they certainly do not inhibit game play in any way.

All items are Preowned unless stated in the description as New.

Enjoyed by players of Baldur’s Gate 2.

In Rygar: The Legendary Adventure, ravenous monsters have destroyed your home and stolen the Princess Harmonia. In the midst of the chaos, deep cracks developed on the surface and a dark, cavernous underworld was formed. Taking place on an Island in the Mediterranean Sea called Argus, Rygar: The Legendary Adventure tells the tale of a noble warrior determined to save the Princess Harmonia and bring the Island of Argus back to a state of peace.
